document_data.name: ''Infernal Spear''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Infernal spears''''' were [[enchanted]] [[polearm]]s wielded by Iron Consuls of [[Bane]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: These [[spear]]s' tips were inscribed with filigreed infernal runes that imbued them with hellish magics.
document_data.Powers: ''Infernal spears'' possessed a simple ''+1'' enchantment that increased their damage output and guided the wielder's hand towards the target. These weapons also dealt additional [[poison]] damage with each strike and had a chance of inflicting a longe-lasting poisoning of living targets.
document_data.History: These ''infernal spears'' could be found in the hands of the [[Cult of Bane]] that infiltrated the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}. The cult's leader, [[Enver Gortash]], outfitted his Iron Consuls with ''infernal spears''. Iron Consuls [[Mian]] and [[Nuff]] and their magic spears stayed at Lord Gortash's side in the [[Wyrm's Rock]] fortress, until his assassination by the [[Absolute Adversaries]].
